member.name: T:PerseusApi.Generic.IActivity
member.summary: This interface is the base from which all other activities are derived. It provides properties that are common to all activities.

member.name: P:PerseusApi.Generic.IActivity.HasButton
member.summary: A shortcut button will be displayed in the top button row. This also requires that an image is returned by ButtonImage>.

member.name: M:PerseusApi.Generic.IActivity.GetMaxThreads(BaseLibS.Param.Parameters)
member.summary: Specifies the maximal number of threads that this acticity can make use of simultaneously.
member.param: The parameters of the activity. The maximal usable number of threads might depend on the parameter settings.

member.name: P:PerseusApi.Generic.IActivity.Url
member.summary: Link to a URL providing further information, documentation, advice about this activity.

member.name: P:PerseusApi.Generic.IActivity.DisplayImage
member.summary: The image for the menu entry and the shortcut button when applicable.

member.name: T:PerseusApi.Generic.IAnalysis
member.summary: Grandmother of all data analysis activities. They operate on one IData and do not produce any new ones automatically. They may do so interactively.

member.name: T:PerseusApi.Generic.IAnalysisResult
member.summary: The output of a generic IAnalysis. It contains the data for this IAnalysis which is serialized with the session.

member.name: P:PerseusApi.Generic.IAnalysisResult.Heading
member.summary: Heading to be displayed on the tab page created for the visual component of this IAnalysisResult.

member.name: M:PerseusApi.Generic.IAnalysisResult.CreateUiElement(System.Action{System.String},System.Action{PerseusApi.Generic.IData})
member.summary: Creates the visual component.
member.param: Callback for displaying text in the status bar.
A new IData can be put here interactively into the workflow.
member.returns: The visual component. Usually this is a UIElement from WPF. Return type is object so that this interface can be used on the server side.

member.name: T:PerseusApi.Generic.IData
member.summary: Generic data structure holding the data that flows through the network. For example, this could be IMatrixData.

member.name: P:PerseusApi.Generic.IData.Name
member.summary: This is the name that e.g. appears in drop-down menus.

member.name: P:PerseusApi.Generic.IData.Description
member.summary: The context help that will appear in tool tips etc.

member.name: P:PerseusApi.Generic.IData.AltName
member.summary: A name that can be displayed as an alternative to Name.

member.name: P:PerseusApi.Generic.IData.Origin
member.summary: For data that has been read from a file this string will contain the file name. If it was originally created by an activity (e.g. 'Create random matrix') it will contain the name of the creating activity.

member.name: P:PerseusApi.Generic.IData.CreationDate
member.summary: Specifies the date and time on which this item has been created.

member.name: P:PerseusApi.Generic.IData.User
member.summary: Name of the user who created this data item.

member.name: M:PerseusApi.Generic.IData.CreateNewInstance
member.summary: Creates an instance of the same data type.

member.name: M:PerseusApi.Generic.IData.CreateNewInstance(PerseusApi.Generic.DataType)
member.summary: Creates an instance of the specified data type.

member.name: M:PerseusApi.Generic.IData.Clear
member.summary: Clears up all data from this instance.

member.name: M:PerseusApi.Generic.IDataWithAnnotationColumns.GetCategoryColumnAt(System.Int32)
member.summary: For performance reasons, please do not call this inside a loop when iterating over the elements. Use GetCategoryColumnEntryAt instead.

member.name: M:PerseusApi.Generic.IDataWithAnnotationColumns.GetCategoryColumnEntryAt(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Get all the categories associated with the table entry at the specified column and row.

member.name: M:PerseusApi.Generic.IDataWithAnnotationColumns.GetCategoryColumnValuesAt(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get all category values used in the specified column. See PerseusLibS.ICategoryVectorData.

member.name: M:PerseusApi.Generic.IDataWithAnnotationColumns.SetCategoryColumnAt(System.String[][],System.Int32)
member.summary: Change the values of an existing category column.
member.param: new values
existing column

member.name: P:PerseusApi.Generic.IDataWithAnnotationColumns.NumericColumns
member.summary: Gets all numeric columns in the table. Might not be feasible for large tables, use instead

member.name: M:PerseusApi.Generic.IDataWithAnnotationColumns.NumericColumnAt(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the numeric column values at the specified row

member.name: P:PerseusApi.Generic.IDataWithAnnotationColumns.StringColumns
member.summary: Gets all string columns in the table. Might not be feasible for large tables, use instead

member.name: M:PerseusApi.Generic.IDataWithAnnotationColumns.StringColumnAt(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Get string column values at the specified column and row

member.name: P:PerseusApi.Generic.IDataWithAnnotationColumns.MultiNumericColumns
member.summary: Gets all multi-numeric columns in the table. Might not be feasible for large tables, use instead

member.name: M:PerseusApi.Generic.IDataWithAnnotationColumns.MultiNumericColumnAt(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the multi-numeric values at the specified column and row

member.name: M:PerseusApi.Generic.IDataWithAnnotationRows.GetCategoryRowAt(System.Int32)
member.summary:
Returns the entire category row at the given row index.
For performance reasons, please do not call this inside a loop when iterating over the elements. Use > instead.

member.name: M:PerseusApi.Generic.IDataWithAnnotationRows.GetCategoryRowEntryAt(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns all the categories at the given row and column.

member.name: M:PerseusApi.Generic.IDataWithAnnotationRows.GetCategoryRowValuesAt(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the unique categories used in the given row.

member.name: M:PerseusApi.Generic.IDataWithAnnotationRows.ExtractColumns(System.Int32[])
member.summary: extract the specified columns in-place
member.param: columns to keep

member.name: T:PerseusApi.Generic.IMultiAnalysis

member.name: T:PerseusApi.Matrix.IMatrixActivity
member.summary: Marker interface indicating activities that operate on IMatrixData. There are currently five IMatrixActivity types implemented: IMatrixUpload, IMatrixProcessing, IMatrixAnalysis, IMatrixCombination and IMatrixExport.

member.name: T:PerseusApi.Matrix.IMatrixData
member.summary: The data structure representing an augmented data matrix which is the main data object that is flowing through the Perseus workflow. Note that plugin programmers are not supposed to write implementations of IMatrixData. The interface only serves to encapsulate the complexity of the implementation for the purpose of plugin programming.

member.name: M:PerseusApi.Matrix.IMatrixExport.GetParameters(PerseusApi.Matrix.IMatrixData,System.String@)

member.param: The parameters might depend on the data matrix.

member.name: M:PerseusApi.Matrix.IMatrixProcessing.ProcessData(PerseusApi.Matrix.IMatrixData,BaseLibS.Param.Parameters,PerseusApi.Matrix.IMatrixData[]@,PerseusApi.Document.IDocumentData[]@,PerseusApi.Generic.ProcessInfo)
member.summary: This is where the actual calculation is implemented.
member.param: A clone of the previous matrix. Changes can be made in place.
Set of parameters with values as they were specified by the user
Additional matrices can be created which will appear as additional output nodes in the workflow.
Documents with textual information on the analysis results can be created here.
Object used to communicate with this process.

member.name: M:PerseusApi.Utils.PerseusUtils.GetAvailableAnnots(System.String[]@,System.String[]@)
member.summary: Search the annotation folder for annotations.
member.param: The name of the base identifier from which the mapping will be performed. For example Uniprot, ENSG
member.returns: A list of annotations for each file. For example {{"Chromosome", "Orientation"},{"KEGG name", "Pfam"}}

member.summary: Search the annotation folder for annotations.

member.returns: A list of annotations for each file. For example {{"Chromosome", "Orientation"},{"KEGG name", "Pfam"}}
